name: Netherlands Organisation for Applied Scientific Research TNO
goal: To connect people and knowledge to create innovations that boost the sustainable competitiveness of industry and well being of society.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Research and innovation policies; framework programme; Horizon2020, HorizonEurope; European Defence Fund;
